mapper.update: update dj_deliver_order_progress set data_status=1 where node_type=#{nodeType} and progress_order_id=#{repairMendOrderId} and node_code=#{nodeCode}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.create_date createDate, t1.progress_order_id progressOrderId, t1.progress_type progressType, t2.`code` nodeCode, t2.`name` nodeName, t2.node_describe nodeDescribe, t2.associated_operation associatedOperation, t2.associated_operation_name associatedOperationName, 5 nodeStatus FROM dj_deliver_order_progress t1, dj_deliver_order_node t2 WHERE t1.progress_order_id = #{progressOrderId} AND t1.node_type = t2.type AND t1.node_code = t2.`code` and t1.data_status = 0 order by t1.create_date,t2.code
